title: Rioters Responses
body:
**Read the Rioters responses! It may help some comfusion!**

**Teemoing Shop** - http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion/Ay9AMsMd-no-teemoing-shop

**Hextech Chests** - http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion/VWYtBybJ-hextech-chests-on-profile

**Item Sets** - http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion/Gv1aUEz0-item-sets

**Champ Select Buying** - http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion/Bgz30FmR-give-the-ability-to-buy-skins-in-champ-select-again

**Client Resources** - http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion/3uGbB00f-alpha-client-takes-much-more-resources-than-the-legacy-one

**Mastery Order** - http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion/crHXxB6V-mastery-order

**Spectate Games** - http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion/gl5kBFpg-can-we-spectate-games


**If you have anymore feel free to post a link and I will add it**

**Enjoy Summoners!
**
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: This is good, there are a lot of duplicate threads. Thanks.
